1.2.0.name: wordpress/currency-converter-rub
1.2.0.description: This widget displays the Russian ruble, according to central bank (cbr). The list of currencies of such countries as GBP, CNY, JPY, KRW, EUR, USD. It is possible to insert a caption to this table, currencies, enable and disable the display of the desired currencies of the world. Enable and disable the output tables of currencies, if cbr does not work. It is possible to choose a set of images of flags of the world: large, medium, small.
